landing.sub2: Orax is a modern tool that, based on historical information, predicts demand to guide us through uncertainty, helping us to make better business decisions and respond more agilely.
landing.list1: Management of information in real time.
landing.list2: Reliable prediction of sales or production.
landing.list3: Adjustments between predictions, stocks or orders.
landing.moreInfoText: We create a package and quote especially for your needs. Ask for it and one of our agents will contact you to help you.
landing.contactOk: Sent, an agent will receive your data and will communicate later.
landing.list5: Optimization of prediction and operations models.
landing.list6: Flexibility and adaptability to the rules and needs.
landing.list9: Intuitive visualization for a complete business analysis.
landing.list14: Flexibility and adaptability to business rules.

register.request: Request your quote at any time from the section "My Account" and continue using Orax.
